meanings.definition: To groom or dress oneself carefully or neatly.
meanings.sent1: She primps before going out to make sure she looks nice.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, he primps in front of the mirror before leaving for work.
meanings.sent3: The cat primps its fur after a nap, trying to look its best.
meanings.sent4: The flower primps its petals, preparing to bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The actor primps backstage, getting ready for the big performance.

meanings.definition: To make oneself look attractive by tidying or styling one's hair or makeup.
meanings.sent1: She primps her hair with a quick brush before the party.
meanings.sent2: He primps his beard, making sure it looks neat and tidy.
meanings.sent3: The clown primps his face with colorful makeup, ready to entertain the children.
meanings.sent4: The tree primps its leaves, showing off its vibrant colors in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The model primps in front of the camera, striking a pose for the photoshoot.
